name: Operation: Pull Request
description:
This is a game jam game for the Github 2012  Game Off. A 2D 3rd person shooter homage to arcade games of the past. This was unfortunately totally over looked in the Game Off :( We may have improperly submitted it. 

Controls

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Grenade

A - LEFT

D - Right

Credits
  • Collaboration between @kevzettler and @bryanzettler
  • Made with CraftyJs
  • All Art and Sound are remixes of classic shooters and garage bands
